/** * Creates a variant of the options factory that applies additional configuration parameters. * *

If no configuration is applied, or if the method directly applies configuration values to * the (mutable) options factory object, this method may return the original options factory object. * Otherwise it typically returns a modified copy. * * @param configuration The configuration to pick the values from. * @return A reconfigured options factory. */

/** * Creates a variant of the options factory that applies additional configuration parameters. * *

If no configuration is applied, or if the method directly applies configuration values to * the (mutable) options factory object, this method may return the original options factory object. * Otherwise it typically returns a modified copy. * * @param configuration The configuration to pick the values from. * @return A reconfigured options factory. */ OptionsFactory configure(Configuration configuration).
